short_definition: A name, other than his true name, by which a person is known; an indication that person is known by more than one name, often shown with the abbreviation AKA (also known as).
long_definition_html: A name, other than his true name, by which a person is known; an indication that person is known by more than one name, often shown with the abbreviation AKA (also known as).
